item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description:
Education

  • PhD in Engineering & IT, The University of Melbourne, 2020
  • MEng in Telecommunications, The University of Melbourne, 2015
  • BEng in Electronics, Universidad del Valle, 2012

Interests

I am interested in the design and analysis of wireless communication systems, with a focus on the Internet of Things (IoT). My research interests include: networked embedded systems, software-defined wireless sensor networks, machine learning, protocols and applications for the Internet of Things.

Teaching

I have served as an academic teaching assistant for multiple subjects in the Electrical and Electronics Engineering Department (EEE Department) at The University of Melbourne, Australia.

  • Head Tutor, Undergraduate Course ELEN30014 Analog and Digital Electronics Concepts (ADEC), EEE Department, The University of Melbourne, Australia, Mar 2018 - Jun 2018, Mar 2019 - Jun 2019.
  • Head Tutor, Postgraduate Course ELEN90066 Embedded System Design (ESD), EEE Department, The University of Melbourne, Australia, Jul 2018 - Nov 2018, Jul 2019 - Nov 2019, Jul 2020 - Nov 2020.
  • Head Tutor, Undergraduate Course ELEN30009 Electrical Network Analysis and Design (ENAD), EEE Department, The University of Melbourne, Australia, Jul 2020 - Nov 2020.

Thesis Supervision

  • Christopher Acosta (BSc), “Comparison of TSCH schedulers for WSNs in Contiki-NG”
  • Qixin Ma (BSc), “Design and implementation of a GUI for a SDWSN architecture”
  • Daniel Borislavov, Niels Georg, and Andreas Work (MSc), “A Software-Defined based Approach for Mobile Internet of Things”

Invited Talks

  • “Operating Systems for IoT”, Guest lecture, Technical University of Denmark (DTU), Denmark, Nov 2021.
  • “Operating Systems for IoT”, Guest lecture, Technical University of Denmark (DTU), Denmark, Nov 2022.

Professional Services

Reviewer for Journals

  • IEEE Internet of Things Journal
  • IEEE Sensors Journal
  • Journal of Network and Computer Applications
  • Ad Hoc Networks, Elsevier
  • Sensors, MDPI
  • Transactions on Emerging Telecommunications Technologies, Wiley
  • Eletronics, MDPI
  • International Journal of Communication Systems

Conference reviewer

  • IEEE Global Communications Conference (GLOBECOM)
  • National Conference on Communications (NCC)

Honors, Awards, and Fellowships

  • Ph.D. Studentship, Networked Society Institute (NSI), Australia, Jan 2017.
  • Colciencias Doctoral Scholarship, Colombian Government, Jan 2017.
  • Melbourne School of Engineering Conference Travel Scholarships, Australia, Apr 2018.
  • Research internship, Networked Society Institute (NSI), Melbourne, Australia, Jan 2015.
  • Colfuturoâ€™s scholarship, Colombia, Jul 2014.
  • Distinguished Student Award, The University of Valle, Colombia, Nov 2011.

Skills

  • Programming Languages: C, Python, Java, MATLAB, Bash, LaTeX.
  • Operating Systems: Linux, Contiki-NG, Windows, MacOS.
  • Software: Git, Docker, Eclipse.
  • Hardware: Arduino, Raspberry Pi, CC2650, CC2538
  • Languages: Spanish (native), English (fluent).
